field.name: summary
field.value: [aspview/monorail] component with litteral attribute value containing dot are not parsed

field.name: description
field.value:
the following component will not be parsed correctly:
<component:echo out="dont.work"></component:echo>
but this will work:
<component:echo out="work"></component:echo>
see attached patch for sample and test case (apply on r324 http://svn.castleproject.org:8080/svn/castlecontrib/viewengines/aspview/trunk)
it seems dot character is not valid as attribute litteral value.
I try to narrow down the issue later
